quests.name: Directive: Danger!
objectives:
EVE still seems a bit nervous...
  ‧ Talk to EVE.

Take pictures around the Docks area of Ancient's Landing to reassure EVE:
  ‧ A giant tree with hanging lanterns near the well.

The small wooden boat you arrived in.
  ‧ A giant statue face in a hallway.
  ‧ A strange sunken doorway between two waterfalls.
Return to EVE.
Fix the bridge between the Glittering Dunes and the Wild Tangle by progressing through the main story.

Take pictures of possible dangers in the Wild Tangle and Glittering Dunes:
  ‧ A lady with long, braided blonde hair.
  ‧ A misplaced boat high up in the jungle.
  ‧ A plant with very pointy teeth.
  ‧ A man with an impossibly thick neck.
  ‧ A snake.
  ‧ A waterfall of sand.
Return to EVE

quests.name: A New Directive
objectives: Feed 2 Monkeys.
Return to EVE.
Follow EVE.
Talk to EVE.
Visit Ancient's Landing.
Find a way to open the door.
Follow EVE to the other side of the gate.
Follow EVE.
Talk to EVE.
Exit the secret garden.

Use your Hourglass to find the last objects in the Swirling Sands around Ancient's Landing:
  ‧ BnL Picnic Blanket.
  ‧ BnL Trashcan Planter.

Gather Flowers:
  ‧ 3 Orange Birds of Paradise.
  ‧ 3 Yellow Birds of Paradise.
  ‧ 3 White Birds of Paradise.
  ‧ 3 Red Luminescent Flowers.
  ‧ 2 Jade.

Make sure you have all the materials for EVE:
  ‧ 1 BnL Picnic Blanket.
  ‧ 1 BnL Trashcan Planter.
  ‧ 3 Orange Birds of Paradise.
  ‧ 3 Yellow Birds of Paradise.
  ‧ 3 White Birds of Paradise.
  ‧ 3 Red Luminescent Flowers.
  ‧ 2 Jade.
Bring all the materials to EVE.
Listen to EVE and WALL-E's discussion.
Take 3 pictures of EVE and WALL-E.
Talk to EVE.

quests.name: Lasers & Crafts
objectives: Go to the secret garden with EVE.
Use your Watering Can on 5 Fires.
Talk to EVE.
Talk to Mirabel.
Return to EVE.
Use your Hourglass to find 2 Ancient Gemstones around Ancient's Landing.

Now that you have the Ancient Gemstones, it's time to melt them.
  ‧ Bring the Ancient Gemstones to EVE.
  ‧ Make sure you have 2 Ancient Gemstones in your Inventory.
Follow EVE to a mystery location.
Talk to EVE.

Use your Royal Tools to remove:
  ‧ 6 Fire.
  ‧ 2 Craters.
Pick up 3 Melted Ancient Gemstones.
Talk to EVE.
Craft the Stone Canvas.
Make sure you have the Stone Canvas in your Inventory.
Bring the Stone Canvas to EVE.
Follow EVE.
Talk to EVE.

quests.name: Directive: Plant
objectives: Go to EVE's House.
Talk to EVE.

Gather the materials:
  ‧ 3 Ancient Gears with the Hourglass.
  ‧ 3 Craft Mechanical Parts at a Crafting Table.
  ‧ 10 Copper.
Craft the Scanner Accessory.
Go to EVE's House.
Make sure the Scanner Accessory is in your Inventory.
Give the Scanner Accessory to EVE.
Inspect the Dreamlight Cobra Lily.
Return to EVE.

Find the Ingredients:
  ‧ Sea Snail.
  ‧ Sand Worm.
  ‧ Scorpion.
Cook a plate of Gourmet Grubs.
Give EVE the Gourmet Grubs.

quests.name: When Things Go Boom
objectives: Talk to Stitch.
Return to EVE.
Collect the Dreamlight Cobra Lily Extract from the Dreamlight Cobra Lily in EVE's House.
Cook the Experimental Fireworks.
Make sure you have the Experimental Fireworks in your Inventory.
Bring the Experimental Fireworks to EVE.
Follow EVE.
Talk to EVE.
Remove 15 Fires.
Talk to EVE.
Talk to Stitch.
Search for 3 Socks with the Royal Hourglass.
Make sure the Socks are in your Inventory.
Bring the Socks to Stitch.

Gather materials:
  ‧ 10 Dream Shards.
  ‧ 5 Red Pitcher Plants.

Make sure the materials are in your Inventory:
  ‧ 10 Dream Shards.
  ‧ 5 Red Pitcher Plants.
Bring the materials to EVE.

Add some Furniture to the Island.
  ‧ 3 Cute Rugs.
  ‧ 6 Cute Chairs.
  ‧ 4 Cute Decorations.
Return to EVE.
Place the Firework Launcher.
(Optional) Wait for night.
Enjoy the Fireworks.
Talk to EVE.

quests.name: Does Not Compute
objectives: Talk to EVE.
Investigate the map in your Inventory.

Use all of your Tools to find ancient artifacts around Eternity Isle:
  ‧ Ancient Slate.
  ‧ Ancient Dictionary.
  ‧ Ancient Processor Blueprint.
  ‧ Ancient Processor Crystal.
  ‧ Ancient Power Sphere.

Gather ancient material with your Hourglass to make the Ancient Processor:
  ‧ 3 Ancient Gear.
  ‧ 3 Ancient Plate.
  ‧ 3 Ancient Magnet.

Repair the Ancient Processor at a Timebending Table.
  ‧ Make sure you have the Ancient Processor in your Inventory.
Bring the Ancient Processor to EVE.

You need to replicate EVE's tech. Take some pictures of items in EVE's House:
  ‧ Something round with holes.
  ‧ Some sort of power output.
  ‧ Some glassy globes.

Gather materials for the Universal Adapter:
  ‧ 10 Oasis Glass.
  ‧ 15 Plastic Scrap.
  ‧ 15 Copper.
  ‧ 3 Mechanical Parts.
  ‧ 2 Brass Ingot.

Craft the Universal Adapter.
  ‧ Make sure you have the Universal Adapter in your Inventory.
Bring the Universal Adapter to EVE.

quests.name: EVE's Challenge
objectives: Talk to EVE.

Gather gems for EVE
  ‧ 5 Evergem
  ‧ 5 Bumblestone
  ‧ 5 Spinel
Talk to Oswald to see what kind of gems he brought for EVE.

Make sure you have EVE's gems in your Inventory.
  ‧ 5 Evergem
  ‧ 5 Bumblestone
  ‧ 5 Spinel
  ‧ 4 Coal
Show the results to EVE.
